kind.desc: The API credential kind, can be one of: `webapp`, `sales_channel`, `integration` or the kind of app you want to fork (e.g. `orders`, `imports`, etc.).

confidential.desc: Indicates if the API credential it's confidential.

scopes.example: market:all market:9 market:122 market:6 stock_location:6 stock_location:33

expires_in.desc: The lifetime of the access token in seconds (min. `7200`, max. `31536000`. Default is `14400` for Sales channels and `7200` for other client types).

mode.desc: Indicates the environment the resource belongs to (one of `test` or `live`).

custom.desc: Indicates if the API credential is used to create a custom app (e.g. fork a hosted app).

created_at.desc: Time at which the resource was created.

updated_at.desc: Time at which the resource was last updated.

reference.desc: A string that you can use to add any external identifier to the resource. This can be useful for integrating the resource to an external system, like an ERP, a marketing tool, a CRM, or whatever.

reference_origin.desc: Any identifier of the third party system that defines the reference code.

metadata.desc: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to the resource. This can be useful for storing additional information about the resource in a structured format.

organization.desc: The organization associated to the API credential.

role.desc: The role associated to the API credential.

filters.desc: Set of key-value pairs that contains restrictions and scopes of the application membership.

membership.desc: The membership associated to the application membership.

membership_profile.desc: The membership profile associated to the application membership.

role.desc: The role associated to the application membership.

stripe_id.desc: The Stripe identification of the billing profile.

user.desc: The user associated to the billing profile.

name.desc: The name of the Identity provider.

client_id.desc: The client ID used for the auth workflow.

client_secret.desc: The client secret used for the auth workflow.

issuer.desc: The issuer used for the auth workflow.

status.desc: The identity provider status. One of `pending` (default), `verified` or `error`.

domains.desc: The list of domains in scope (comma-separated).

token_url.desc: The token URL used for the auth workflow.

authorize_url.desc: The authorize URL used for the auth workflow.

jwks_url.desc: The JWKS key store URL used for the auth workflow.

txt_record.desc: The TXT record value used to check the domain.

organization.desc: The organization identifier for authorize params.

created_at.desc: Time at which the resource was created.

updated_at.desc: Time at which the resource was last updated.

reference.desc: A string that you can use to add any external identifier to the resource. This can be useful for integrating the resource to an external system, like an ERP, a marketing tool, a CRM, or whatever.

_disable.desc: Send this attribute if you want to mark this resource as disabled.

_enable.desc: Send this attribute if you want to mark this resource as enabled.

disabled_at.desc: Time at which this resource was disabled.

user.desc: The user associated to the identity provider.

owner.desc: Indicates if the user it's the owner of the organization.

test_enabled.desc: Used to enable test mode on the accessible apps.

test_enabled.desc: Used to enable test mode on the accessible apps.

created_at.desc: Time at which the resource was created.

updated_at.desc: Time at which the resource was last updated.

reference.desc: A string that you can use to add any external identifier to the resource. This can be useful for integrating the resource to an external system, like an ERP, a marketing tool, a CRM, or whatever.

reference_origin.desc: Any identifier of the third party system that defines the reference code.

metadata.desc: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to the resource. This can be useful for storing additional information about the resource in a structured format.

organization.desc: The organization associated to the membership.

application_memberships.desc: The application memberships associated to the membership profile.

logo_url.desc: The URL to the organization's logo.

favicon_url.desc: The URL to the organization's favicon.

contrast_color.desc: The organization's contrast color. Format is HEX (starts with `#` and is followed by six letters and/or numbers).

gtm_id.desc: The organization's Google Tag Manager ID.

gtm_id_test.desc: The organization's Google Tag Manager ID for test.

region.desc: The region where the organization is located. The default value is `eu-west-1`.

can_switch_live.desc: Indicates if the organization can switch to live mode.

subscription_info.desc: Information about the current subscription such as the plan type, limits, and subscription totals counter.

api_auth_redirect.desc: Enables the redirect on the new Auth API.

api_rules_engine.desc: Enables the rules engine for flex promotions and price list rules.

api_rules_engine_max_conditions_size.desc: The fallback maximum number of conditions within a rules payload on a ruleable object, default is {API_RULES_ENGINE_MAX_CONDITIONS_SIZE}.

api_rules_engine_max_rules_size.desc: The fallback maximum number of rules within a rules payload on a ruleable object, default is {API_RULES_ENGINE_MAX_RULES_SIZE}.

api_new_auth.desc: Forces the usage of the new Authentication API.

api_purge_single_resource.desc: Enables the purge of cached single resources when list is purged.

api_max_regex_length.desc: The maximum length for the regular expressions, default is {API_MAX_REGEX_LENGTH}.

addresses_phone_required.desc: Indicates if the phone attribute is required for addresses, default is {ADDRESSES_PHONE_REQUIRED}.

orders_min_refresh_lapse.desc: The minimum lapse in fraction of seconds to be observed between two consecutive order refreshes. If refresh is triggered within the minimum lapse, the update is performed, but no order refresh is done, until the lapse is observed.

orders_autorefresh_cutoff_test.desc: The maximum number line items allowed for a test order before disabling the autorefresh option.

orders_autorefresh_cutoff_live.desc: The maximum number line items allowed for a live order before disabling the autorefresh option.

orders_number_editable_test.desc: Enables orders number editing as a string in test (for enterprise plans only).

orders_number_editable_live.desc: Enables orders number editing as a string in live (for enterprise plans only).

orders_number_as_reference.desc: Enables to use the order number as payment reference on supported gateways.

orders_invalid_coupon_errors.desc: Enables raising of API errors in case the provided coupon code is invalid, default is {ORDERS_INVALID_COUPON_ERRORS}.

bundles_max_items_count.desc: The maximum number of SKUs allowed for bundles, default is {BUNDLES_MAX_ITEMS_COUNT}.

coupons_min_code_length.desc: The minimum length for coupon code, default is {COUPONS_MIN_CODE_LENGTH}.

coupons_max_code_length.desc: The maximum length for coupon code, default is {COUPONS_MAX_CODE_LENGTH}.

gift_cards_min_code_length.desc: The minimum length for gift card code, default is {GIFT_CARDS_MIN_CODE_LENGTH}.

gift_cards_max_code_length.desc: The maximum length for gift card code, default is {GIFT_CARDS_MAX_CODE_LENGTH}.

cleanups_max_concurrent_count.desc: The maximum number of concurrent cleanups allowed for your organization, default is {CLEANUPS_MAX_CONCURRENT_COUNT}.

exports_max_concurrent_count.desc: The maximum number of concurrent exports allowed for your organization, default is {EXPORTS_MAX_CONCURRENT_COUNT}.

imports_max_concurrent_count.desc: The maximum number of concurrent imports allowed for your organization, default is {IMPORTS_MAX_CONCURRENT_COUNT}.

imports_purge_cache.desc: Enables purging of cached resources upon succeeded imports.

imports_skip_errors.desc: Disables the interruption of the import in case its errors exceeds the 10% threshold, default is {IMPORTS_SKIP_ERRORS}.

promotions_max_concurrent_count.desc: The maximum number of active concurrent promotions allowed for your organization, default is {PROMOTIONS_MAX_CONCURRENT_COUNT}.

promotions_max_conditions_size.desc: The maximum number of conditions within a rules payload on a promotion object, default is {PROMOTIONS_MAX_CONDITIONS_SIZE}.

promotions_max_rules_size.desc: The maximum number of rules within a rules payload on a promotion object, default is {PROMOTIONS_MAX_RULES_SIZE}.

price_lists_max_conditions_size.desc: The maximum number of conditions within a rules payload on a price list object, default is {PRICE_LISTS_MAX_CONDITIONS_SIZE}.

price_lists_max_rules_size.desc: The maximum number of rules within a rules payload on a price list object, default is {PRICE_LISTS_MAX_RULES_SIZE}.

imports_trigger_webhooks.desc: Enables triggering of webhooks during imports, default is {IMPORTS_TRIGGER_WEBHOOKS}.

discount_engines_enabled.desc: Enables the use of an external discount engine in place of the standard one, default is {DISCOUNT_ENGINES_ENABLED}.

discount_engines_errors.desc: Enables raising of API errors in case of discount engine failure, default is {DISCOUNT_ENGINES_ERRORS}.

tags_max_name_length.desc: The maximum length for the tag name, default is {TAGS_MAX_NAME_LENGTH}.

tags_max_allowed_number.desc: The maximum allowed number of tags for each resource, default is {TAGS_MAX_ALLOWED_NUMBER}.

tax_calculators_errors.desc: Enables raising of API errors in case of tax calculation failure, default is {TAX_CALCULATORS_ERRORS}.

external_promotions_errors.desc: Enables raising of API errors in case of external promotion failure, default is {EXTERNAL_PROMOTIONS_ERRORS}.

can_read.desc: Determines if the permission have access to read rights.

can_update.desc: Determines if the permission have access to update rights.

can_destroy.desc: Determines if the permission have access to destroy rights.

subject.desc: The resource where this permission is applied.

restrictions.desc: An object that contains additional restrictions.

price_cents.desc: Indicates the plan price, in cents.

currency_code.desc: The currency used in the `price_cents` field.

extra.desc: An object that contains additional specifications.

limits.desc: The limits associated to the plan.

stripe_id.desc: The Stripe identifier of the subscription.

totals.desc: The number of current organizations, markets, memberships, and SKUs associated with the subscription.

cancellable.desc: Indicates if the subscription can be cancelled.

account_type.desc: Indicates the billing context associated to the subscription.
